examples.chinese: 他们的爱情故事很感人。
examples.pinyin: Tāmen de àiqíng gùshì hěn gǎnrén。
examples.english: Their love story is very touching.

examples.chinese: 爱情是生活中最美好的东西。
examples.pinyin: Àiqíng shì shēnghuó zhōng zuì měihǎo de dōngxī。
examples.english: Love is the most beautiful thing in life.

english: to arrange, to plan, to set up

examples.chinese: 我们需要安排一个会议。
examples.english: We need to arrange a meeting.

examples.chinese: 他已经安排好了旅行的细节。
examples.pinyin: Tā yǐjīng ānpái hǎole lǚxíng de xìjié。
examples.english: He has already arranged the details of the trip.

examples.chinese: 请你帮我安排一下明天的日程。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng nǐ bāng wǒ ānpái yīxià míngtiān de rìchéng。
examples.english: Please help me arrange tomorrow's schedule.

examples.chinese: 安全第一，其他都可以放在后面。
examples.pinyin: Ānquán dì yī, qítā dōu kěyǐ fàng zài hòumiàn。
examples.english: Safety first, everything else can come later.

examples.chinese: 请确保你的行李是安全的。
examples.pinyin: Qǐng quèbǎo nǐ de xínglǐ shì ānquán de。
examples.english: Please ensure that your luggage is secure.

examples.pinyin: Zhè zuò chéngshì de zhì'ān hěn hǎo。
examples.english: The public safety in this city is very good.
Please arrive at the meeting room on time.

examples.pinyin: Tā zǒng shì ànshí wánchéng gōngzuò。
examples.english: He always completes his work on time.

examples.chinese: 我们需要按时提交报告。
examples.english: We need to submit the report on time.

english: according to, in accordance with, on the basis of

examples.chinese: 按照规定，我们需要提交申请。
examples.pinyin: Ànzhào guīdìng, wǒmen xūyào tíjiāo shēnqǐng。
examples.english: According to the regulations, we need to submit an application.
Please operate according to the manual.

examples.chinese: 按照你的建议，我已经做了调整。
examples.pinyin: Ànzhào nǐ de jiànyì, wǒ yǐjīng zuòle tiáozhěng。
examples.english: I have made adjustments according to your suggestions.
